item.description:
Hi Trailblazers join us for a pre Halloween Party on Wednesday, October 24th, 5:30pm at The Thirsty Moose (downstairs), 21 Congress Street, Portsmouth

That’s right, we have a new location!The Thirsty Moose. For those who are not familiar- it was formerly known as Foobar and also Muddy River Smokehouse.  The fun starts from 5:30 to 8pm. 50 beers are on tap (cash bar), plus tasty appetizers provided by Thirsty Moose.

This is a fundraiser! This month we are supporting the Portsmouth Halloween Parade, and we couldn’t be more excited. All proceeds at the door will be going to support the parade and their amazingly creative works. $5 gets you in, $10 or more gets you in plus a t-shirt (while supplies last). What a deal!

Because this party is just a week before Halloween we thought you may want to try out your new costumes. So we are also going to have a costume contest. You don’t have to come in costume, but if at least 10 of you do, a minion from the Halloween Parade will judge you appropriately and the winner will get $100 cash. Yup, cash. The kind you can spend on things and stuff. We will also have a few very cool, very creepy indie video games to play on a big screen (Limbo, Slender).

After our event The Thirsty Moose has a fun night planned with 4 local bands starting around 9pm. The bands are: The Orange Umbrellas, Sneeze, The Erotic City Electric Blues, and Black Norse. You’re welcome to stick around and enjoy the tunes.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Halloween Party
